1c216371-9edf-445f-9f27-c7d50374a08e.description: Students will be challenged to develop their awareness as global citizens and social justice warriors through engagement with Amnesty International. Amnesty International empowers young people to help fight abuses of human rights worldwide, bring torturers to justice, change oppressive laws and free people jailed just for voicing their opinion. Students will be involved in signing petitions and engaging in letter writing campaigns to use their voice as agents of change in the real world.
1c216371-9edf-445f-9f27-c7d50374a08e.name: Junior Global Citizenship Badge

issuer.summary: issued by St John XXIII Catholic College Stanhope Gardens

entity.name: St John XXIII Catholic College Stanhope Gardens

badge_template_activities.title: This student has demonstrated global citizenship by increasing their own awareness about the world around them and social injustices through activities such as researching, signing and sharing existing petitions through organisations such as Amnesty International.
